item.description:
Join members and friends of the MoonPool Coven for our Sunrise Ostara Celebration on Sunday, March 22, 2009

Celebrate the arrival of Spring, when light and darkness are in balance (but the light is growing stronger!). The forces of masculine energy and feminine energy are also in balance and this day paves the way for the coming lushness of summer. Ostara is a time when all elements within and without us are brought into harmony. A time of new life and rebirth, as well as the end of Winter! Rain or shine. Service starts at 6:30 AM sharp. Check http://www.veaseypark... for directions.

This is a wonderfully enriching, educational and fun circle. Learn about different ways of celebrating the turns of the Wheel of the Year, meet new people and learn to share personal experiences, stories, laughter and joy in the spirit of the seasons!

Please check http://www.MoonPool.o... for more details.

There will be no class this week
item.name: Sunrise Ostara Celebration
